ModMetaData.name: Soil Relocation
ModMetaData.author: Evelyn
ModMetaData.description:
With SoilRelocation, you can dig and relocate soil! No more do you have to run around to little patches of rich soil, you can move them together! You can move them indoors to make a mountain greenhouse! You can have dirt with this excellent advance in technology!
Depends on my Consistent Map Stone mod.
